channel.title: climate change on The Byte
channel.description: Recent content in climate change on The Byte

item.title: What is causing Climate Change? Is it us or is it just a natural event?
item.description: Climate Change is a huge global issue that we are currently experiencing on the planet. It’s been a huge problem known for decades but only now are we actually seeing the effects of it on the news. From devastating wildfires to powerful surges of floods. We are living dangerously close to the point of no return, so close to the start of mass extinctions. So how can we solve this?
